title: bad stuff in NZ part 1
content:
Er... the god of default anybody? Seriously, they stuck this up at the end of my street the other weekend and I'm _not_ amused. I recently coined the phrase ‘half-assed aesthetic’ to describe what goes on around here in place of a beautiful or useful visual language... but this really takes the biscuit (so far).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018063133im_/http:/typophile.com/files/billboard_5329.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [billboard.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018063133/http:/typophile.com/files/billboard.jpg) | 107.87 KB |
author: ben_archer

comments.content: I know that I would be unable to resist the temptation to vandalize that.
These people apparently make god to be incapable of carrying out his will outside of New Zealand.
